website_summaries.verdict: It has assets that many mothers will appreciate, but it also has some flaws that make it impractical for some.
pros: Its microfiber filling is soft and flexible
Sports a removable cover made with 40 percent bamboo for added softness
cons: It's not quite as firm as other models, but some testers preferred this feature

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is for me!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent literally hundreds of dollars on pillows to find the right one. I sleep with my arm under my head and never have found anything that was comfortable. They are always too soft, or so firm that it squished out from under my head. A friend told me about this pillow, and it's perfect! I had to get my husband one, too, because he kept stealing mine. It took me a minute to decide how to best configure it for optimum comfort, but I'm thrilled with this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had purchased sooner
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. It's amazingly soft and squishy yet firm. It takes boppy pillow covers which is great for quick cleaning without having to throw the whole pillow in the washer, which is a pain with other pillows I've tried. I actually first used this brand as a regular pillow in my bed and it honestly changed the way I sleep, so I would recommend getting one of these for the bed! I only wish I had purchased this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: PoopDollar

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my newborn
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my on week old newborn! Brought it to the hospital with us when she was born, and a lot of the nurses all commented on how amazingly soft it was. Baby loves it too! Good for breastfeeding assistance and for having her propped up for story time. Not to firm and not too soft. Just right for us. Slightly smaller than a Boppy though. Cover is easy to clean and manage with baby messes. Already washed this twice, and it still stays super soft and fresh after hang drying.
customer_reviews.author: B.W. SallyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this to sit on.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for the wife to use to sit on. She has a bulging disc and restricted nerves and more stuff wrong with her. She was having pain when sitting and I bought donut pillows I bought 3 of them but they seemed not to work and then came across this and thought hey why not try it. And glad I did so as it is fluffy then others and does exactly what we needed it to do ...
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Buys

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a boppy?
customer_reviews.text: I love the boppy pillows but refuse to pay that price for them. I found this instead and decided to give it a try and I love it! it is so comfortable and works great for everything. my babies love tummy time with support and this pillow is perfect. they also love lounging on it like a chair and it props them up enough to keep them from freaking out till they learn to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fabric pills after use
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has been indispensable. I like that there is a cover that you can remove and wash. I have also washed the pillow in the washing machine, which however deformed it a little, but did not make it unusable. My biggest concern is the material of the cover (which is really nice and soft) pills after awhile of use and when you pull on those pills, long strands of fibers hang from them. I've found these long strands on my daughter's clothes while feeding, so I have to watch out that they don't get in her mouth or wrapped around fingers/toes.
customer_reviews.author: Malahala

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Boppy
customer_reviews.text: I agree with all the other posters saying that this pillow is too soft for breastfeeding. I bought it to replace an older Boppy but I'm still using the Boppy now because this pillow doesn't support an 8 pound infant. This pillow is also too small for the Boppy covers
customer_reviews.author: M. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Wish It was A Tad Bigger
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this pillow. I just wish it was a tad larger and firmer. It wasn’t really supportive for nursing so I ended up giving it to my daughter and she uses it to sleep on. I wouldn’t recommend this pillow for nursing, but my daughter said it’s a 5 star for sleeping pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2SixMunchkins

customer_reviews.title: Stained and appeared gently used
customer_reviews.text: This was my second failed attempt to get a bamboo Boppy knockoff. This one was decently filled, though not as thick or sturdy as a Boppy. Sadly the quality of the cover was subpar as well, thin and did not seem that it would hold up with daily use or regular washing. It was also stained and the fabric appeared fuzzy like it had been gently used.😝 Definately not giftable. I am taking the plunge and getting a Boppy.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Momma

customer_reviews.title: The worst part for me is the case that came with ...
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is just alright. The worst part for me is the case that came with it. The case pills really badly and there will be these stretchy and sticky long pieces of string that come off of it. I don't mind the softness of this pillow and I have been using it to breastfeed. I'm really glad someone gave me their old cover to use with it that doesn't shed like this one does. I should've probably gotten a boppy instead
customer_reviews.author: Wife Hero of the gods

customer_reviews.title: Fabric snags constantly and pillow is too soft
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this pillow but the fabric catches on everything especially my wedding ring so I constantly have threads attached to me or on my couch or hand. The pillow is too soft and my baby sinks too far down making me have to bend forward to breast feed. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin R. Vargo

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing pillow for the the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! I have a Boppy pillow as well, but I wanted a second nursing pillow to keep in our family room so I didn't have to remember to bring the other one with me when we watch tv in the evening. Very soft and bigger than the Boppy pillow. I also feel like it lays a little flatter than the Boppy, which makes it easier to nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Also great for neck support!
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard for me to sleep with a regular pillow. I ended up using my old Boppy Pillow once my son grew out of breastfeeding. It's been really hard for me to transition ever since. I got this to replace the Boppy Pillow since it was beyond repair from so much use. This is treating my neck just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fern Doolen

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them. Love that pillow. Very soft, the cover is easy to take off and wash. Feels very comfortable, It is neither too firm nor too soft. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Boppy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pillow! I like it even better than the brand boppy! I bought one of each for different rooms and I find myself bringing it everywhere. It’s cheaper and comes with a soft cover. It fits other covers so easy to keep clean! Definitely worth the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Atom

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We love it and price it just right! It's well-made, soft, cover is easy to wash and dry fast. Functional. We use it all the time for feeding, napping, book reading chill time, sitting support and tummy time.
customer_reviews.author: Alpha WolframTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but a little too soft
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very soft, comfortable, easy to compress and stuff into my backpack when I needed to take it elsewhere, affordable, washable cover. Baby does like to lounge on it. Cons: too soft (not enough support) and doesn't keep shape as well while breastfeeding as some of the regular boppies they had at the lactation consultants office
customer_reviews.author: simone

customer_reviews.title: -It doesn’t have chemical odor like some brands
customer_reviews.text: -The “gray checked” pillow looks blue on the photo, but it’s gray in person. -It’s small, but fits me well (I wear X-small). -It doesn’t have chemical odor like some brands. -The pillow is soft and the cover is smooth. I’ll update my review after baby comes.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Better than boppy
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I love this so much that I had to. It’s soft even without a cover, but easily fit inside the standard boppy covers that I bought. This is the perfect blend of firm and soft. My little man and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JRHEWE7484

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love !!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this pillow is for way way more than just breastfeeding!! I have severe back pain so obviously it's great for when I breastfeed, helps me keep a good posture etc... then I just put it around my waist while sitting in the couch and noticed they it was great for lumbar support as well! Love this !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my breastfeeding journey! Then, it doubled as a prop for her as she got bigger. 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Ondrea Blakemore

customer_reviews.title: Its okay. Perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: It's small, I think it would be perfect for travel. I'm also going to take it to the hospital when I give birth. It's super soft! And it stays cool, I did use it on a car trip and took a nap with it and it was comfortable. I ordered a different cover for it and so far so good. I do wish I came with a travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: MammaBear14Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I expected-but that’s a plus! Some other brands can be so big and bulky. This is our fifth child- I never save these because they get so much use and are usually so bulky. Super soft. Removable cover.
customer_reviews.author: A Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like this MORE than my boppy! It seems a tad bit skinnier and more flexible. The cover is nice and neutral, it did great with a wash and dry in low heat. I would highly recommend this! What a deal at half the price of a boppy!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Henry

customer_reviews.title: The cover is soft, but it starts shedding these ...
customer_reviews.text: The cover is soft, but it starts shedding these stringy fuzz that is impossible to get off your hands. Also, after less than a month of use it was really flat. I think it was too soft to provide enough support for feeding the baby without hurting my back from the beginning, but that could be just a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Dumais

customer_reviews.title: and is a nice way for us to make baby comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Overall this pillow has served it's purpose. It has worked very well for feeding, and is a nice way for us to make baby comfortable. On the downside, we washed this pillow (since it states it is machine washable) on the delicate cycle and were left with a pile of fluff. I would appreciate if someone could contact me regarding this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby support pillow
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for newborn nursing or bottle for baby and parents both For support
customer_reviews.author: Constance Prostko

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Recieved a Boppy case at a shower, but didn't want to drop the big money for a name brand nursing pillow. Found this one and bought it. You can see by the picture that the pillow is a little small for my boppy case but it works just fine. I love the feel of the fabric, and the firmness is just right.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Must have for nursing mommy's!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my very pregnant daughter in law and she absolutely loves it! Can't wait to try it while nursing my 1st grandson! She liked the fact that it comes with a removal cover, I didn't realize this at the time and bought a cover for it so that worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok..
customer_reviews.text: Well if you ever used a boppy and are expecting the same from this one..don't get it...it does the job but it's too soft and I end up using anothrr pillow with it.
customer_reviews.author: Admira Halilic

customer_reviews.title: Best nursing pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this pillow for 11 months! Since my little one was born. What can I say? I can’t live without it. I use it to nurse mostly but it’s had many other uses like for proping the baby, as a pillow for me, etc. Easy to clean, stays the same shape. I just bought another one as a gift for my friend’s baby shower. Amazing product. Boppy Pillow is like $50, this one is more budget friendly and just better overall. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Better than needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife after looking at similar brands at the local "marts". There were a few factors that made this the winner. It was as good a price or better as the others. The soft, safe bamboo fabric removable cover was another huge factor. We also liked the company's product reviews. She hasn't used the pillow yet, seeing as she hasn't given birth yet. We will update after further usage!
customer_reviews.author: adam schaad

customer_reviews.title: Too small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m small frame 150 lb 54” and it keeps slipping out because Is too small Too thin!!! Not recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: MARGARITA

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without this
customer_reviews.text: If you are a new mom, you cannot live without this product. It helped with breastfeeding and back comfort like you'd never believe. I love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Used this as a boppy pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Just as big as a boppy pillow. Holds its shape and firmness after alot of use. I recommend. And it's very soft good quality fabric. Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pillow for nursing and for baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow for nursing and for baby. I used it with my grandson and he was ver comfortable resting on it. Now that he has outgrown it, I use it. Good price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the big brand name nursing pillow but is much less expensive. I actually like the cover on this pillow much better than the expensive brand. This cover is very soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Great feeding pillow. I had a boppy previously with my other children and couldn't find it so I bought this one. Can't tell the difference. Cover is good quality cotton fabric. I got the aqua color and it's a cute print.
customer_reviews.author: lori ann gould

customer_reviews.title: Good substitute for the boppy pillow
customer_reviews.text: A good substitute for the expensive boppy pillow. It's just a tad smaller than the boppy but does the work. Wish it came in more kid friendly colors.
customer_reviews.author: ramrat

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is perfect for breastfeeding and is extremely comfortable and does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a cover and came just as expected. The pillow is perfect for breastfeeding and is extremely comfortable and does not sink in with weight!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Good nursing pillow
customer_reviews.text: Good for you or gift! No longer nursing. But my son uses it to lay on and relax. Nice option to remove the outer part so you can wash.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: ... cheap nursing pillow but the cover quality is not great. The fabric pulls easily and there are elastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose for a cheap nursing pillow but the cover quality is not great. The fabric pulls easily and there are elastic fibers coming off of it in multiple places just from normal use. Besides that it serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hough

customer_reviews.title: Well done great price
customer_reviews.text: Love these pillow it's good for sleep after bbl great price good quality
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great for any mom
customer_reviews.text: Every nursing mother or just new mom needs one. It's smaller then normal nippy pillow but has soft cover on it and is good size. I use it everywhere even the car when I stop to feed her on trips.
customer_reviews.author: JandMB2212

customer_reviews.title: Cover sheds
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about this pillow other than the fact that the cover is shedding horribly. I've owned it for a month and will be purchasing a Boppy cover tomorrow as I'm tired of pulling giant strings off myself, my baby, and my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great backup
customer_reviews.text: It is cute but too small for what I like. I like to have my daughter higher up while I feed so.I don't have to bend down for her to eat. I use it as a back up to my other one that is thicker and more ridged.
customer_reviews.author: Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t really use it for nursing but my baby would ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really use it for nursing but my baby would lay in it. Now that he is bigger he lays on it with a pillow behind him and watches baby videos.
customer_reviews.author: Tina18

customer_reviews.title: Tooooo fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Its too fluffy, can not hold my baby in good position for breastfeeding. Waste of money. And the fabric its bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pillow
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pillow, extremely soft cover and its removable to wash or to replace with a different cover. Its made very well and not cheap by any means. I had a boppy years ago and they are so expensive now. This was definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as the popular name brand pillows.
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as the popular name brand pillow. I like the texture/feel of this pillow but it doesn’t fill out the pillow covers sold for these kinds of pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie R.

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough for nursing
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like this pillow because it is not firm enough to hold baby on ur laps/abdomen while breast feeding baby.It keeps slipping off my laps and making nursing difficult however, the price is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Akwarandu

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, supportive, easy to care for!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow! I have been out and about and had to nurse our newborn without, and it was so much more challenging. I’d highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: We used these as propping pillows for feeding and they lost their shape within 2 months of using. Disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: ASEK

customer_reviews.title: Basically Boppy
customer_reviews.text: Pay for a brand name Boppy if you want to, this is fine. Boppy covers fit okay, this pillow is a tiny bit less plump. Used with both of my kids until the could sit up on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is a life saver we literally use it every day multiple times!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Compares to Boppy
customer_reviews.text: Compares to Boppy Brand. Do not know if it’s safe for washer/dryer due to bamboo cover. Doing great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kitz’l

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is so sensational. It is extremely soft and looks comfortable. I have not doubt baby girl will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Nicole

customer_reviews.title: not like a boppy
customer_reviews.text: too soft and not supportive enough to use as a nursing pillow. Does not compare well to using a boppy nursing pillow.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous_reviewer

customer_reviews.title: ... I have a broken tailbone and it is working awesome. Much better than the donut
customer_reviews.text: I use this to sit on as I have a broken tailbone and it is working awesome. Much better than the donut. Price was good and quality product. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: ... bit bulky and my wife said it's not very easy to set it up
customer_reviews.text: it's a bit bulky and my wife said it's not very easy to set it up, but on the other hand it gives very nice support and it's convenient once you "wear" it
customer_reviews.author: Momchil

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for nursing, I though the entire pillow was made from bamboo, not just the covering.
customer_reviews.author: Cartridge

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure they will both love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for 2 different girls as gifts. I will update once they receive and try them but seeing and feeling it, its gorgeous! I'm sure they will both love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cyn15790

customer_reviews.title: I like the softness of the pillow cover and the softness ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the softness of the pillow cover and the softness of the pillow itself. It is smaller than the boppy so it does not fit/stay around my waist as well.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved it but within a couple of weeks it I could basically fold it in half. I had to throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Benitez

customer_reviews.title: MY daughter is very happy its soft and i also got the bamboo slip ...
customer_reviews.text: MY daughter is very happy its soft and i also got the bamboo slip cover its really nice easy to keep clean wish i had this stuff 36 yrs ago
customer_reviews.author: TJG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and huge! I wasn't expecting this to be so large or so soft but it's perfect and the price is even better. It's hard to find a nursing pillow that's under $30-$40. This is a great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: HarleyQueen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are GREAT!! I looked in the stores and at other places online for these and everyone was much more expensive! These are great size , cute and work well in our nursing mothers room at our church.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So much better than a boppy brand.. I have had several brands. This is the best Worth every penny plus more.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cover is super soft, pillow is perfectly supportive. My L&D nurse thought it was much nicer than most nursing pillows she saw come through.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as name brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before being given a name brand Boppy. This one works just as well. It's just not quite as thick or flexible. Boppy covers fit it well, so feel free to buy those as spares. All in all, a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: This Must Be The Place

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: A littl smaller than expected but still a great pillow
customer_reviews.author: Bridger K

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great! It’s very full creating the perfect height for breastfeeding and the cover comes off easily so you can wash it separately.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great size & texture.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect texture, super soft yet firm, my baby is asleep on it right now, love this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Enid Wellness

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is terrible quality. I had to buy a new cover ...
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is terrible quality. I had to buy a new cover two weeks after ordering. Should have returned it. Not worth the money buy different pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Its very cushiony and super soft to feel. I love it! I will have tonorder another one for the baby lol
customer_reviews.author: Yanin C

customer_reviews.title: She loves it almost as much as him!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift but it's so soft. My friend, whom I bought the gift for, barely had time to check it out before her boyfriend took it and hoarded it lol might have to get a second lol
customer_reviews.author: bickie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my friend she loved it she uses it all the time for her baby.
customer_reviews.author: Laschel C.

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and is very happy with the pillow
customer_reviews.text: I brought this pillow for my granddaughter who just had a baby. She loves it and is very happy with the pillow. Thank you for getting it to her so quick
customer_reviews.author: Ukchik

customer_reviews.title: Love their customer set but the nursing pillow was too ...
customer_reviews.text: Love their customer set but the nursing pillow was too small for me and I'm size medium. Would love to buy from them again but maybe some other product.
customer_reviews.author: svetlana Shahnazaryan

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughter and I loved this. It made nursing so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hill

customer_reviews.title: The filling holds its shape much better than the traditional cotton filling in other leading brands
customer_reviews.text: I live this pillow! The filling holds its shape much better than the traditional cotton filling in other leading brands, and you get both a pillow AND a cover for $10 less than the cost of JUST the pillow from other sellers! The cover is also very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Entrekin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Could have been a bit more firmer. But its amazing in reducing fatigue when I am holding baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a off boppy but alittle smaller than i expected
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Karns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is amazing! It is just thick enough to support baby with out being uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lacie E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to boppy. The pillow is a bit thinner but a nice options
customer_reviews.author: Erin C

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get to use it for nursing but baby has ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get to use it for nursing but baby has been sleeping on it since day 1 and now he's 6 months old. Still loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Boppy
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! We have two Boopy brand pillows and this was less expensive but just as good! Our Boppy pillow cases fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Overall great quality, and super soft
customer_reviews.text: I'll give 4 starts only because i thought the pillow would be bigger. Overall great quality, and super soft!
customer_reviews.author: Shana M.

customer_reviews.title: Blessed relief!
customer_reviews.text: I get blessed relief for the arthritis in my neck with this pillow. Can’t sleep without it. This is my second purchase. One for travel and one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The delivery is very fast, and I can’t wait to disassemble it after arrival. I really like it.things are very good and the quality is very good
customer_reviews.author: Carr Dan

customer_reviews.title: very nice for bigger baby that doesn't need as much help ...
customer_reviews.text: Softer than a boppy, very nice for bigger baby that doesn't need as much help up when nursing due to size.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product so usefull
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday and every time. Really big size for bigger babies
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product. Was delivered to the wrong address and I had to go get it but happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Holland

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow for nursing
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow and small enough to travel with but the pillow itself could be more firm for a more solid support.
customer_reviews.author: Casimira Teruel

customer_reviews.title: Too bad.
customer_reviews.text: Received in a torn cellophane and black smudges on pillow case. No tags and unaware it was ever new?! Sending back for another one.
customer_reviews.author: E. merrill

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it! It's so soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow because my dog tore my other and this is the cheapest one I could find. I was not expecting the high quality it is! I absolutely love it! It's so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Loses shape quickly, not the greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this pillow for 3 months and used it strictly for breastfeeding, I was not pleased with the fact that it immediately flattened after the first month and the cover has already started to ball and fray.. I should have just spent the 10 extra dollars for the boppy.
customer_reviews.author: koree kimball

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it. It doesn’t offer te support needed, it gets flat after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: theo

customer_reviews.title: Reeks of Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This really smells like chemicals--it's 100%polyester filling and a poly/bamboo mix for the cover. There's no false advertising with the filling, but the odor is really strong, even after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Big Beeks

customer_reviews.title: ... after only a few weeks of use although its super soft. Get a boppy cover for this
customer_reviews.text: Fabric cover pulling and covering baby in fuzz after only a few weeks of use although its super soft. Get a boppy cover for this!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P. Wood

product_meta.title: All American Collection Comfortable Soft Plush Light Polyester Bamboo Nursing Travel Pillow for Mom Baby Toddler
product_meta.description:
Size:18 x 12| Color:Beige Bamboo CoverYour search for the exclusive Nursing Pillow is finally over!

Our New Portable, Soft and Light Nursing Pillow provides not only comfort to Mom and Baby but it is multipurpose too. You can use it on the floor to support your child as they learn to sit upright or wear it around your house for proper nursing support.


Features and Benefits:



 * Exclusive Comfort For First Timer Moms - Breastfeeding might be painful at first for first-time moms. The best nursing pillow can give you the proper comfort and support you need. A nursing pillow is designed to make nursing your new born easier and more comfortable for you. With the All American Collection Nursing Pillow, you can set your baby at the right height while feeding. It will also help you relax as this pillow removes strain from your back as it can be worn around your waist.
 * 100% polyester The All American Collection Nursing Pillow is made of 100% polyester, so you are assured that it's durable and will last for a long time.
 * Feather-soft microfibers The nursing pillow from All American Collection is filled with feather-soft microfibers that are hypoallergenic, so it's safe to use.
 * Machine washable Keeping it clean is never a problem as the All American Collection Nursing Pillow is machine washable. The pillow will remain soft even after washing.
 * Soft polyester cover The All American Collection Nursing Pillow has a soft polyester cover that's easy to wash.


Click on Add to Cart and enjoy the nursing pillow that is not just great for use at home, but also convenient for travel.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY MATERIAL: The Nursing Pillow is filled with 100% Polyester. The cover is 40% Bamboo and 60% Polyester that make it portable, soft and light.

TOTAL PROTECTION FOR EVERYBODY: The Nursing Pillow is made from an exclusive material that pillow always remains soft and light. Pillow is allergen protected and smooth cover protects your baby's skin from irritation
EASY CLEAN - MACHINE WASHABLE PILLOW: Keeping the Nursing pillow clean is very easy and machine washable. The Nursing pillow will remain soft even after washing it too.

MULTIPURPOSE: The Nursing pillow is exclusively designed for mom and baby in Breastfeeding, Bottle Feeding, and Propping etc. Though it is multipurpose and could be used in versatile ways. It is just great for use at home, also convenient for travel. You can use it on the floor to support your child as they learn to sit upright or wear it around your house for proper nursing support.

MOM AND BABY'S COMFORT: The Nursing Pillow is certainly designed to meet the needs of both the mother and the baby. The material used for pillow does not develop any allergies to mother and baby. The pillow case is very smooth that protects your baby's skin from irritation. The pattern and color on the pillow provide calm feelings.
